titles.title: Recognizing the importance of the 2015 Special Olympics World Games hosted by the United States of America in Los Angeles, California.
Recognizing the importance of the 2015 Special Olympics World Games hosted by the United States of America in Los Angeles, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the importance of the Special Olympics World Games to the millions of people with intellectual disabilities and their loved ones.
Expresses support for the efforts of those who make the Games possible.
Celebrates the return of the World Games to Los Angeles.
